=== RUN   TestDocFactory
DEBUG 2020/04/05 23:09:39 doc.go:37: Adding build actions for go binary module 'test-doc'
    TestDocFactory: doc_test.go:50: build.ninja:   # ******************************************************************************
        # ***            This file is generated and should not be edited             ***
        # ******************************************************************************
        #
        # This file contains variables, rules, and pools with name prefixes indicating
        # they were generated by the following Go packages:
        #
        # gomodule [from Go package
        # github.com/tnsts/design-practice-2/build/gomodule]
        #
        ninja_required_version = 1.7.0
        
        rule g.gomodule.docs
            command = cd ${workDir} && godoc -url ${pkg} > ${outputPath}
            description = generate docs for ${pkg}
        
        # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # #
        # Module:  test-doc
        # Variant:
        # Type:    go_doc
        # Factory: github.com/tnsts/design-practice-2/build/gomodule.DocFactory
        # Defined: Blueprints:2:7
        
        build out/docs/my-docs.html: g.gomodule.docs | my-docs_test.go
            description = Genaration of docs for test-doc package
            outputPath = out/docs/my-docs.html
            pkg = .
            workDir = .
        default out/docs/my-docs.html
        
--- PASS: TestDocFactory (0.00s)
=== RUN   TestTestBinFactory
DEBUG 2020/04/05 23:09:39 tested-binary.go:52: Adding build actions for go binary module 'test-binary'
    TestTestBinFactory: tested-binary_test.go:52: build.ninja:   # ******************************************************************************
        # ***            This file is generated and should not be edited             ***
        # ******************************************************************************
        #
        # This file contains variables, rules, and pools with name prefixes indicating
        # they were generated by the following Go packages:
        #
        # gomodule [from Go package
        # github.com/tnsts/design-practice-2/build/gomodule]
        #
        ninja_required_version = 1.7.0
        
        rule g.gomodule.binaryBuild
            command = cd ${workDir} && go build -o ${outputPath} ${pkg}
            description = build go command ${pkg}
        
        rule g.gomodule.test
            command = cd ${workDir} && go test -v ${pkg} > ${outputPath}
            description = test ${pkg}
        
        # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # #
        # Module:  test-binary
        # Variant:
        # Type:    go_binary
        # Factory: github.com/tnsts/design-practice-2/build/gomodule.TestBinFactory
        # Defined: Blueprints:2:7
        
        build out/bin/test-binary: g.gomodule.binaryBuild | main.go
            description = Build test-binary as Go binary
            outputPath = out/bin/test-binary
            pkg = .
            workDir = .
        default out/bin/test-binary
        
        build out/test-results/test-res.txt: g.gomodule.test | main.go
            description = test-binary tests to Go binary
            outputPath = out/test-results/test-res.txt
            pkg = .
            workDir = .
        default out/test-results/test-res.txt
        
--- PASS: TestTestBinFactory (0.00s)
PASS
ok  	github.com/tnsts/design-practice-2/build/gomodule	(cached)
